TopicTitle: few thinks I noticed while playing

Articles.Content:
Well, I bought the game and played it a bit. My PC can just handle it (1070 ti, watercooled I5 and 16 gb ram). with big crafts FPS was lower, but still playable. If my rocked crashed it lagged a lot. But it is playable and just good enough to not ask for a refund.

Bugs I had:

-engine snaps weird while assembeling vehicle, sometimes by moving vehicle the engine is 45° turned (bit still snapped)

- while pressing launch my computer kept showing tje assemby building from insight. Needed to reload previous safe

- and some already known bugs

 

Stuff that needs to change to improve gameplay:

-performance, by a lot

- auto strut

-being able to turn vehicle during time acceleration. Reaction wheels are not working as good as in ksp1 (fine with that), but I am a bit impatient. Also for big (interstellar) crafts needed

-  procedural feul tanks and solid rocked boosters (only in length procedural). Would reduce amount of parts in the vehicle and the make searching for right feul tank easyer 

- There are also some parts thag need to be added, but first the game needs to run better 

On a positive note:

- procedural wings (lobe them) 

- a lot more fearing deployment and cargobay options 

- engine mount > can place more engines and engine feafing options wich looks way better that the KSP decouoler one

- easyer finding parts and part sizes 

- more subassemblies. (you can create one big ship and then lanuch it in parts)
